allow: Bash(python scratchpad/ssh_cmd.py "echo -e ''Subject: Test from Claude\\nFrom: claude@alpharabbit.purefictionrecords.com\\nTo: admin@alpharabbit.purefictionrecords.com\\n\\nHey admin, this is a test email sent from the claude account. Checking if Nextcloud Mail picks it up.\\n\\nCheers,\\nClaude'' | sendmail admin@alpharabbit.purefictionrecords.com")

docs: Add Warren DOM architecture vision for v2.5

Planning document describing the full DOM/CSS/XSLT model
for the Warren framework refactor.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
